articles.title: Record-breaking number of EFL Clubs achieve Family Excellence status - EFL
articles.description: A total of 65 EFL Clubs have achieved Family Excellence status for the 2021/22 season, 12 of which have been crowned as ‘Gold Award’ winners for their exemplary work in engaging families on matchdays.
